homePageText.title: Luxury apartments in the heart of Krakow
homePageText.description: If you are planning a romantic weekend getaway, a longer tourist stay, or a business visit in Krakow, our private apartments are an ideal choice for you. Their convenient location in the very heart of the city guarantees easy access to major attractions, museums, restaurants, theaters, and other entertainment centers. On the other hand, they ensure peace and discretion. We provide personal service at the highest level!
homePageText.listItem1: The strict center of Krakow, a historic district!
homePageText.listItem3: 3 minutes walk to the Main Market Square
